  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085919</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Concept maps: an introduction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konzeptkarten: eine Einleitung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cartes de concept : une introduction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mapas do conceito: uma introdução</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programmi di concetto: un'introduzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χάρτες έννοιας: μια εισαγωγή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Correspondencias del concepto: una 
introducción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Using concept maps can help students make connections among subject areas. This article explains how teachers can use concept maps effectively and provides links to tools for creating them online.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mit Konzeptkarten machen Sie helfen 
Kursteilnehmern, Beziehungen unter Bereichen herzustellen ein. 
Dieser Artikel beschreibt, wie Lehrer Konzeptkarten effektiv 
benutzen können und stellt Links zu den Hilfsmitteln für sie online 
herstellen zur Verfügung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En utilisant des cartes de concept mettez en 
boîte aident des étudiants à établir des rapports parmi des 
domaines. Cet article explique comment les professeurs peuvent 
utiliser des cartes de concept pertinemment et fournit des liens aux 
outils pour les créer en ligne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usando mapas do conceito enlate ajudam a 
estudantes fazer conexões entre áreas sujeitas. Este artigo 
explica como os professores podem usar mapas do conceito eficazmente e
fornece as ligações às ferramentas para criá-las em linha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usando i programmi di concetto inscatoli aiutano 
gli allievi a fare i collegamenti fra i settori. Questo articolo
spiega come gli insegnanti possono usare efficacemente i programmi di 
concetto e fornisce i collegamenti agli strumenti per la creazione 
loro in linea.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η χρησιμοποίηση των χαρτών έννοιας μπορεί να βοηθήσει
τους σπουδαστές να κάνουν τις συνδέσεις μεταξύ των θεματικών 
περιοχών. Αυτό το άρθρο εξηγεί πώς οι δάσκαλοι μπορούν να
χρησιμοποιήσουν τους χάρτες έννοιας αποτελεσματικά και παρέχει 
τις συνδέσεις με τα εργαλεία για τους on-line.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Con correspondencias del concepto conserve ayudan 
a estudiantes a hacer conexiones entre temas. Este artículo 
explica cómo los profesores pueden utilizar correspondencias del 
concepto con eficacia y proporciona a conexiones a las herramientas 
para crearlas en línea.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
